name: Highway Driver
description:
Description:

This is some variation of the runner game, inspired by the nostalgia of the old Tetris racing game

You have to steer your car driving along the highway, bypassing other cars

The main mechanic is steering, not just offset controls like swipes

The goal is to drive as far as possible

In the future:
  • Improving the spawn system of other cars
  • Customization of the model and color of the car

I would be very grateful for any feedback or suggestions
